# Office Seating SA - Defence Chairs Tender

## Tender Announcement Overview

* **Reference Number:** WS3731584361-Doc3731741302
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3731584361
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-01
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-17T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-11-15
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

## Contracting Entity

* **Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User Entity

* **Entity Name:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Name:** Shannon Brewster (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14516105?extsite=MTQ1MTYxMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Amendment to Tender

Please note that the closing time for submission of required supporting documentation and bid submission has been modified to 02:00PM EST on November 17, 2022. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

This tender involves the procurement of defence chairs. The tender expired on November 17, 2022, at 14:00:00. The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the end user entity is the Department of National Defence (DND). For more information, please refer to the notice URL provided. 

Note: I corrected some minor errors in the original data, and excluded some irrelevant information while still maintaining all necessary details. I assume you will be ultimately removing
